text.tspan: Carbon dioxide emissions are higher in richer countries …
Unit 20 'Capstone: Economics of the environment’ Section 20.10 'Policy choices matter' in The CORE Team, The Economy.
GDP per capita (PPP constant 2011 international dollars)
Source: The World Bank (2018); Maddison Project Database (2018)
Note: CO2 emissions are displayed on the 'MAP' tab
